steps.name: Input Files
steps.description:
Open your files (.edf, .eeg or .sts) and select the montage and channels you want to detect the sleep spindles on.

The .tsv file is also needed for the edf format.

The .sig file is also needed for Stellate format.

The whole NATUS subject folder is also needed for the .eeg format.

steps.name: Segment Viewed-MODA
steps.description:
Select events to run the spindle detection on i.e. SegmentViewed.

Start by selecting one PSG or multiple files (with the ctrl key pressed), then select an event group or name.

Be aware that the files must still be highlighted in the GUI to apply the 'Select All' option.

alias.tooltip: List of aliases separated by a semicolon(;) character

file_selection_only.tooltip: Set it to 1 if you only need to select a file and not its montages and channels.
